Articles.Content:
As you see,I'm back to this awesomely incredible game

I'm now working on planes,and thought is it possible to use drogue parachute like this:

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/4f/SAAF-BAE_Hawk-Drogue_parachute-001.ogv

^ Wikipedia owns it

I tried this several times,but plane tips over.I know,to use parachute like that you must line up com,what is pretty hard to do with planes!

Any ideas?

By the way,I know that parachutes cut off when you hit the ground,so let's talk about situation while you're still in air,and you need to slow down the plane

Edited November 3, 2013 by JiWint
I've tried, but it seems to be impossible. When you're in the air you tend to be going to fast and the parachute gets ripped off.
The parachute doesn't rip off for me,maybe try more struts?
If you are not adverse to using Mods B9 Aerospace has some deploy-able air brakes that work better than parachutes in Atmo.

Well,I did it! Actually got what I didn't need but this is a good invention: HTVL plane Horizontal Takeoff Vertical Landing.I found good placement for chutes so they just slow you down very fast,and put you into horizontal position and you take down very easily ^^
